data.question: What is the purpose of synthesizing a modified paullone bearing a TEMPO free-radical unit?
data.answer: The purpose is to inhibit RNR activity and show high antiproliferative activity in human cancer cell lines.

data.question: What are the starting materials for the synthesis of HL1 and HL2?
True or False: The presence of a TEMPO radical instead of 2,2,6,6-tetramethylpiperidine always results in increased cytotoxicity across all cell lines.
What method was used to determine the generation of intracellular ROS by the compounds?
Which compound showed negligible activity in increasing ROS levels?
True or False: The copper(II) complexes exerted antiproliferative effects without killing cells in SW480 cells.
What was the effect of adding 2 mM dithiothreitol (DTT) to hR2 and compound 2?
data.answer: It led to complete tyrosyl radical destruction after 30 seconds.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of HL1 and HL2 involved a step where a TEMPO radical unit was attached to the paullone backbone.
What was the coordination environment of the copper(II) ion in [Cu(L2)Cl]?
data.answer: The copper(II) ion had a square-pyramidal coordination environment.

data.question: True or False: The presence of a TEMPO radical is advantageous for cytotoxicity in all cell lines tested.
What was the main conclusion regarding the structural modifications of the compounds?
data.answer: The structural modifications, especially the presence of the TEMPO radical, are advantageous for cytotoxicity but not in all cell lines.

data.question: True or False: The compounds with a TEMPO radical moiety showed a stronger induction of ROS than those without the radical moiety.
What was the effect of compound HL1 on apoptosis induction in SW480 cells?
data.answer: HL1 showed a remarkable induction of apoptosis of up to 61% in SW480 cells.

data.question: True or False: The ligand HL2 induced less apoptosis in both SW480 and SK-Mel-28 cells compared to HL1.
What was the role of 1-hydroxybenzotriazole in the synthesis of HL1 and HL2?
data.answer: It was used in the reaction to attach the 2,2,6,6-tetramethylpiperidine or TEMPO radical units onto the paullone backbone.

data.question: True or False: Complexation with copper(II) has a significant effect on the cytotoxicity of the compounds.
What was the effect of compound 2 on the tyrosyl radical in hR2 RNR protein?
data.answer: Compound 2 showed marked hR2 RNR inhibitory activity, destroying more than 60% of the tyrosyl radical after 20 minutes.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of HL1 and HL2 was performed in a single step.
What was the effect of compound HL2 on necrosis induction in SK-Mel-28 cells?
data.answer: HL2 induced enhanced necrosis in SK-Mel-28 cells.

data.question: True or False: The EPR spectra confirmed the presence of a TEMPO radical in HL2 and compound 2.
